definition.name: Azure Infrastructure for Open AI powered Chat
definition.description: This action helps deploy Infrastructure to Azure that helps achieve a chat-completion experience powered by Open AI
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: env-name
inputs.description: Name of environment where env values are set

inputs.name: openai-location
inputs.description: Location to deploy OpenAI resources to

inputs.name: bring-your-own-data
inputs.description: Boolean to indicate if you are bringing your own data

inputs.name: data-path
inputs.description: Path to data to be used to train the OpenAI model

inputs.name: additional-args
inputs.description: Additional arguments to be passed to the deployment script
